oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Marriage bond
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Marriage bond of the father of General Gideon Pillow, also named Gideon Pillow. The elder Gideon Pillow married Anne Payne. Includes transcription and appears to be a microfilm copy of the original.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
